Package pieces

Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
chess.Piece
pieces.Pawn
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Pawn
extends Piece
A Pawn is the representation of a pawn chess piece, implementing the abstract methods declared in Piece.
Author:
Patrick Barry, Philip Murray
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    (package private) boolean hasMoved
    Stores whether a Pawn has moved
    (package private) int moveDirectionDelta
    The y-direction a Pawn moves in, 1 for white, -1 for black
    (package private) int passantItteration
    Stores the ParentBoard.gameItteration (the turn number) that a Pawn took a 2-step move on

    File a Pawn must reach to be promoted.

  • Field Details

    • hasMoved

      boolean hasMoved
      Stores whether a Pawn has moved

    • promotion_bar

      int promotion_bar
      File a Pawn must reach to be promoted. 0 or 7 (corresponding to File 1 or File 8), which is the yth index of Board.layout a Pawn must reach to be promoted.

    • moveDirectionDelta

      int moveDirectionDelta
      The y-direction a Pawn moves in, 1 for white, -1 for black

    • passantItteration

      int passantItteration
      Stores the ParentBoard.gameItteration (the turn number) that a Pawn took a 2-step move on

  • Constructor Details

    • Pawn

      public Pawn​(int s)
      Constructor for the Rook class
      Parameters:
      s - side (0: white, 1: black) of the Rook

  • Method Details

    • getString

      public java.lang.String getString()
      Returns ASCII representation of the Queen Used in Board.render method
      Specified by:
      getString in class Piece
      Returns:
      bp - If black Pawn. wp - If white Pawn.

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(Position newpos, Piece promotion) throws IllegalMoveException
      This is the Pawn's implementation of the moveTo method. Performs various legality checks on requested movement. If a check fails, an IllegalMoveException is thrown corresponding to the failed check. Move is applied on this Piece's ParentBoard.
      Specified by:
      moveTo in class Piece
      Parameters:
      newpos - New position
      promotion - Optional Piece that is supplied when Pawn reaches the other end of the chess Board. Promotion replaces Pawn at newpos.
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - For Pawn: Cannot move a step forward when Piece is located there
      IllegalMoveException - For Pawn: Diagonal movement requires capture
      IllegalMoveException - For Pawn: Can only move two steps forward on first move
      IllegalMoveException - For Pawn: Cannot move two steps forward another Piece is located there
      IllegalMoveException - Move vector does not match a legal move

    • isPassantPawnAt

      boolean isPassantPawnAt​(Position p)
      Method is used by Pawn's moveTo implementation to see if there exists an enemy Pawn which has moved two steps in the previous turn.
      Parameters:
      p - Position to check.
      Returns:
      true if there exists a Pawn at p which has moved two steps in the previous turn. false - if no such pawn exists.
